title: AI on Mars? NASA’s Perseverance Rover Just Drove Across the Red Planet Without Humans
description: NASA lets AI take the wheel on mars, guiding the Perseverance rover across the Red Planet with stunning results.

title: It’s Starting to Look Like AI Has Killed the Entire Model of College
description: "Colleges and universities face an existential issue before them."The post It’s Starting to Look Like AI Has Killed the Entire Model of College appeared first on Futurism.

title: AI Trade Secrets Theft: Former Google Engineer Found Guilty of Stealing AI Secrets for China

title: A video showed unicyclists riding while shoveling snow. A journalist set out to decide if it was AI or real life
description: Were there really unicyclists clearing snow in Somerville, Mass., or was it AI sorcery? An intrepid Boston Globe reporter found out.

title: Why saying 'please' and 'thank you' doesn't really add to the cost of using AI
description: OpenAI’s chief executive Sam Altman has acknowledged it all adds to operating costs at the scale of billions of prompts. At the same time, it is a stretch to suggest that treating ChatGPT politely comes at significant environmental cost
